overview: Wanted: The Owen Hawk Collection brings you the star's favorite scenes, spanning 4 years of career complete with special introductions and behind the scenes information. From innocent twink, to leather clad power bottom, to muscle daddy barebacker, "WANTED" is a one of a kind collection, with over 8 scenes, 17 guys, and over 3.5 hours of non-stop action.
title: Wanted: The Owen Hawk Collection
